Summary: flight of a bright red light
divs: Sighting DetailsSetting in hot tub at 1125 pm west coast time. Looking west saw a red light low behind the trees . Live close to joint base lewis mcord in tacoma wa. and thought it might be a helicopter. observed the red light moving toward my position ne bound. I then realized that if is was an aircraft i would be looking at a green light. Then i realizes the light was climbing. observed the light for 3-4 min till it went threw the clouds. Looked like a rocket or missil. no contrail no sound. I am a pilot with 27000 flight hours. plz feel free to call.
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Washington
There was one other sighting in Washington on or around April 26th 2013
